category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_4gd_registry
preference.preference_description: Activates the Object Directory Services (ODS) registration of 4th Generation Design (4GD) objects. The ODS registry feature prevents the creation of duplicate objects across federated multi-sites. Valid Values: - true: The 4GD Objects registry is active and can be used for registering 4GD objects. - false:The 4GD Objects registry is not active and cannot be used for registering 4GD objects.
